title: Replace background music with more exciting/thrilling track

requirements.text: Replace the current background music file with a new, more exciting and thrilling music track that plays continuously throughout the quiz game experience
acceptanceCriteria: New background music file is more energetic and thrilling in tempo and intensity compared to the current track
Music loops continuously during gameplay without interruption
Music maintains consistent volume and quality throughout playback

constraints: Do not modify the audio playback implementation in frontend/src/pages/QuizGame.tsx
Keep the existing sound effects for correct and incorrect answers unchanged
nonGoals: Changing sound effect files for answer feedback
Adding volume controls or audio settings
Modifying when music starts or stops playing
